alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A slow moving strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, northwestern Bristol and central Providence Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smithfield, or near Johnston, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Cranston, Pawtucket, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Burrillville, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester and Blackstone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
